derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: probably of Low German or Dutch origin; compare with Middle Low German, Middle Dutch tubbe

entry.def: A tub is a deep container of any size.

example.ex: He peeled the paper top off a little white tub and poured the cream into his coffee...
example.tran: 他把小白盒上的纸盖撕去，然后把奶油倒进他的咖啡里。

example.ex: Shrubs can be grown in tubs or large containers.
example.tran: 灌木可以种植在盆里或大型容器中。

entry.def: A tub is the same as a bathtub .

example.ex: She lay back in the tub.
example.tran: 她向后靠着躺在浴缸里。

means.word_mean: 1. a relatively large open container that you fill with water and use to wash the body
2. a large open vessel for holding or storing liquids
3. the amount that a tub will hold;

list.explanation: 笨重而航行缓慢的船，老爷船

example.en: His old tub of a vessel was known from one end of the Pacific to the other.
example.zh: 他那条旧船是太平洋东西两头出了名的。
